abstract: French Pres Nicolas Sarkozy, in nationally televised interview in which he appears drawn and dour, warns his austerity-weary country that the nation's new commitments under the plan to rescue Greece and the euro would require even greater economic discipline.
snippet: The French president says greater discipline will be required because of the nation’s commitments under the plan to rescue Greece and the euro.
lead_paragraph: The French president says greater discipline will be required because of the nation’s commitments under the plan to rescue Greece and the euro.

headline.main: Sarkozy Warns France of New Economic Reality
headline.print_headline: New Reality Is at Hand On Economy, Sarkozy Says
headline.seo: Sarkozy Warns France of New Economic Reality
